title: 1¬† Introduction to Meeting Attendees
text:
1.2 How to do this:

In the lower right hand side of RStudio, navigate to üìÅFiles and Open AttendeesIntros.qmd
View using Visual Editor [top right of toolbar]
Select the picture to insert a picture of yourself
Select ‚ÄòHeader 3‚Äô in Toolbar dropdown (default is ‚ÄòNormal‚Äô), then Type your Name and Institution
On the next line, Type a few sentences about yourself. If you‚Äôd like to add a citation, see the Open Sciences‚Äì> Zotero for more information.

title: 1¬† Introduction to Meeting Attendees
text:
1.3 

1.3.1  Cory Hom-Weaver, SWFSC
Cory started working as an acoustic ecologist at SWFSC in 2020. During her time at the center, her research has focused the detection and classification of baleen whales in the California Current Ecosystem. She is also interested in technological development of passive acoustic monitoring systems. In her free time she loves to surf, cook and hike.
